box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right;

font-size: 22px;
div.font: - Identify the locations where you can configure IBM Cloud Activity Tracker Event Routing to manage auditing events.

div.style: font-size: 22px;
font-size: 22px;
div.font: - Identify which services in those locations generate events that you can manage by using IBM Cloud Activity Tracker Event Routing

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 479px; margin-left: 110px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right;
display: inline-block; font-size: 150px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1011px; height: 1px; padding-top: 379px; margin-left: 266px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 190px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.font: - Decide the location in your IBM Cloud account where the IBM Cloud Activity Tracker Event Routing metadata account configuration metadata is stored.
Take into account any corporate or industry compliance requirements such as Financial Services validated locations, or EU-managed regions.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 680px; margin-left: 120px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right;
display: inline-block; font-size: 150px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 992px; height: 1px; padding-top: 600px; margin-left: 276px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 160px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: Decide whether public endpoints, private endpoints, or both are allowed to manage the Activity Tracker Event Routing account configuration.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 128px; height: 1px; padding-top: 889px; margin-left: 100px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right;
display: inline-block; font-size: 150px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1001px; height: 1px; padding-top: 800px; margin-left: 276px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 170px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.font: Define the locations where an account administrator can configure targets to collect auditing events.
You can choose any of the supported locations where Activity Tracker Event Routing is available.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1090px; margin-left: 120px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right;
display: inline-block; font-size: 150px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1001px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1000px; margin-left: 276px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 160px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.font: Define 1 default target per account to configure where auditing events that are not explicitly managed in the account's routing rules are routed.
Consider defining a second default target per account when you want to collect the data in a backup location or account.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1270px; margin-left: 120px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right;
display: inline-block; font-size: 150px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1001px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1170px; margin-left: 276px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 230px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
font-size: 22px;

div.div: Define the targets where you plan to collect auditing events based on your regulatory and corporate requirements.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 108px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1509px; margin-left: 110px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right;
display: inline-block; font-size: 150px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1011px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1409px; margin-left: 266px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 190px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: Define the routing rules that indicate how to route events in your account.
Decide if you want to drop the collection of auditing events in 1 or more regions. Check any compliance requirements to confirm that you can.
